favCards.name: Sword of Feast and Famine

cards.name: Peregrination
cards.oracle_text: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, reveal those cards, and put one onto the battlefield tapped and the other into your hand. Shuffle, then scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom.)

cards.name: Prodigy's Prototype
cards.oracle_text:
Whenever one or more Vehicles you control attack, create a 1/1 colorless Pilot creature token with "This token crews Vehicles as though its power were 2 greater."
Crew 2 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 2 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)

cards.name: Abzan Ascendancy
cards.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
Whenever a nontoken creature you control dies, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying.

cards.name: Act of Authority
cards.oracle_text:
When this enchantment enters, you may exile target artifact or enchantment.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile target artifact or enchantment. If you do, its controller gains control of this enchantment.

cards.name: Aerial Modification
cards.oracle_text:
Enchant creature or Vehicle
As long as enchanted permanent is a Vehicle, it's a creature in addition to its other types.
Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has flying.

cards.name: Answered Prayers
cards.oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control enters, you gain 1 life. If this enchantment isn't a creature, it becomes a 3/3 Angel creature with flying in addition to its other types until end of turn.

cards.name: Asha's Favor
cards.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has flying, first strike, and vigilance.
cards.flavor_text: As his new wings lifted him high above Bant, Taric felt his earthly aspirations transform into heavenly resolve.

cards.name: Cathars' Crusade
cards.oracle_text: Whenever a creature you control enters, put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control.
cards.flavor_text: Avacyn's holy warriors kept hope alive in her darkest hours. Now they will carry that hope across Innistrad.

decks.creator: Beuwu
decks.name: Ratas Agropecuarias
decks.description: Mazo especializado para controlar los mazos agros, invocamos ratitas cosineras que nos daran el sustento para poder aguantar,

cards.name: Blightbelly Rat
cards.oracle_text:
Toxic 1 (Players dealt combat damage by this creature also get a poison counter.)
When this creature dies, proliferate. (Choose any number of permanents and/or players, then give each another counter of each kind already there.)

cards.name: Carrion Rats
cards.oracle_text: Whenever this creature attacks or blocks, any player may exile a card from their graveyard. If a player does, this creature assigns no combat damage this turn.
cards.flavor_text:
"Just what I need—more competition."
—Cabal grave robber

cards.name: Burglar Rat
cards.oracle_text: When this creature enters, each opponent discards a card.
cards.flavor_text:
"Even rats hoard their treasures. Are your precious things so different?"
—Izoni

cards.name: Blood Operative
cards.oracle_text:
Lifelink
When this creature enters, you may exile target card from a graveyard.
Whenever you surveil, if this card is in your graveyard, you may pay 3 life. If you do, return this card to your hand.

cards.name: Crypt Rats
cards.oracle_text: {X}: This creature deals X damage to each creature and each player. Spend only black mana on X.
cards.flavor_text:
"Shoo, you little worm tails—go away! My corpses aren't your dinner!"
—Ghoulcaller Gisa

decks.creator: Papitas
decks.name: Angel Guards
decks.description: Mazo agro de angeles preparados para purificar a los desalmados y ratitas cocineras...

cards.name: Admonition Angel
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Landfall — Whenever a land you control enters, you may exile target nonland permanent other than this creature.
When this creature leaves the battlefield, return all cards exiled with it to the battlefield under their owners' control.

cards.name: Angelic Arbiter
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
Each opponent who cast a spell this turn can't attack with creatures.
Each opponent who attacked with a creature this turn can't cast spells.

cards.name: Angelic Curator
cards.oracle_text: Flying, protection from artifacts
cards.flavor_text:
"Do not treat your people as you treat your artifacts. Let them go, and they will live; seal them here, and they will die."
—Urza, to Radiant

cards.name: Angel of Fury
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature dies, you may shuffle it into its owner's library.

cards.name: Angel of Finality
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, exile target player's graveyard.
cards.flavor_text: "Better the dead depart utterly than be enslaved."

cards.name: Angel of Despair
cards.oracle_text:
Flying
When this creature enters, destroy target permanent.
cards.flavor_text:
"I feel in them a sense of duty and commitment, yet I can feel nothing else. It is as if their duty is to an empty void."
—Razia, Boros archangel

cards.name: Angel of Condemnation
cards.oracle_text:
Flying, vigilance
{2}{W}, {T}: Exile another target creature. Return that card to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
{2}{W}, {T}, Exert this creature: Exile another target creature until this creature leaves the battlefield. (An exerted creature won't untap during your next untap step.)

cards.name: Angelic Wall
cards.oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Flying
cards.flavor_text:
"The air stirred as if fanned by angels' wings, and the enemy was turned aside."
—Tales of Ikarov the Voyager

comments.comment: Este mazo es espelunantemente bueno! No podemos contra tantas ratitas cocineras
Super recomendado para gente que recien empieza!
No me gusta mucho tu mazo proque esta lleno de ratitas que solo ensucian la cocina, mi mazo de angeles le van a ganar. ajajajajaja rendite!
Este mazo es una pija!!!! c======3
Es como tu mama el mazoo!
